name: Princess Fashion Salon
description:
Being a princess is every girl’s dream. Are you ready to do a makeover for your princess? Whether you want to be the fabulous princess living in the bright castle who represents love or you want to be a glamour princess living in the dark castle who represents evil, we can meet your demands here. Choose your favorite princess world and start dressing up your princess.

>>Features<<
--2 Princess Themes: Bright Princess Theme & Dark Princess Theme.
--Each Theme has its own sets of makeup and dress-up stuff: various makeup options, outfits and more.
--Except for dresses, you are able to dress up your princess in some gorgeous casual outfits, just like you would like to dress-up in some casual days.
--Halloween themed makeup and outfits for you to mix and match. Help you get ready for the upcoming Halloween Party.
--Various eye makeup styles: fresh, elegant, emo, gothic.
--Various collections of jewelries: stunning, cool, trendy.
--Stockings, gloves, and everything you can think of.
--Take a photo of your princess and share it with your friends on facebook and twitter. Or simply you just want to save your photo and make it your wallpaper.

PS: Support iphone retina/ ipod touch retina/ ipad retina.

Any Ideas and suggestions?
Bug Reporting?
Other?
